YafBBCode.Name: YOUTUBE
YafBBCode.ReplaceRegex: <!-- BEGIN youtube --><object width="425" height="350"><param name="movie" value="http://${prefix}youtube.com/v/${id}"></param><embed src="http://${prefix}youtube.com/v/${id}" type="application/x-shockwave-flash" width="425" height="350"></embed></object><!-- END youtube -->

YafBBCode.Name: GOOGLEWIDGET
YafBBCode.ReplaceRegex: <!-- BEGIN Google Widget --> <script type="text/javascript" src="http://${prefix}gmodules.com/ig/ifr?${url}"></script> <!-- END Google Widget -->

YafBBCode.Name: SPOILER
USERLINK
VIMEO
YafBBCode.ReplaceRegex: <object width="425" height="350"> <param name="allowfullscreen" value="true" /> <param name="allowscriptaccess" value="always" /> <param name="movie" value="http://www.vimeo.com/moogaloop.swf?clip_id=${vimeoId}&server=www.vimeo.com&show_title=1&show_byline=1&show_portrait=0&color=&fullscreen=1" /> <embed src="http://www.vimeo.com/moogaloop.swf?clip_id=${vimeoId}&server=www.vimeo.com&show_title=1&show_byline=1&show_portrait=0&color=&fullscreen=1" type="application/x-shockwave-flash" allowfullscreen="true" allowscriptaccess="always" width="425" height="350"> </embed> </object>

YafBBCode.Name: HIDDEN
YafBBCode.Description: [HIDDEN][localization=HIDEMOD_DESCRIPTION]The tag hides content from people until they press the thank you button for the post.[/localization][/HIDDEN]
